description: 1:1 wrapping of abap-adt-api into a MCP server.

nodeTlsRejectUnauthorized.description: Set to false to ignore self-signed certificates. Optional.

capabilities.name: transportInfo
capabilities.description: Get transport information for an object source

capabilities.name: transportSetOwner
capabilities.description: Sets the owner of a transport.

capabilities.name: transportAddUser
capabilities.description: Adds a user to a transport.

capabilities.name: systemUsers
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of system users.

capabilities.name: syntaxCheckCode
capabilities.description: Perform ABAP syntax check with source code

capabilities.name: syntaxCheckCdsUrl
capabilities.description: Perform ABAP syntax check with CDS URL

capabilities.name: getObjectSource
capabilities.description: Retrieves source code for ABAP objects

capabilities.name: setObjectSource
capabilities.description: Sets source code for ABAP objects

capabilities.name: deleteObject
capabilities.description: Deletes an ABAP object from the system

capabilities.name: activateObjects
capabilities.description: Activate ABAP objects using object references

capabilities.name: activateByName
capabilities.description: Activate an ABAP object using name and URL

capabilities.name: objectRegistrationInfo
capabilities.description: Get registration information for an ABAP object

capabilities.name: validateNewObject
capabilities.description: Validate parameters for a new ABAP object

capabilities.name: nodeContents
capabilities.description: Retrieves the contents of a node in the ABAP repository tree.

capabilities.name: mainPrograms
capabilities.description: Retrieves the main programs for a given include.

capabilities.name: featureDetails
capabilities.description: Retrieves details for a given feature.

capabilities.name: collectionFeatureDetails
capabilities.description: Retrieves details for a given collection feature.

capabilities.name: findCollectionByUrl
capabilities.description: Finds a collection by its URL.

capabilities.name: createTestInclude
capabilities.description: Creates a test include for a class.

capabilities.name: prettyPrinter
capabilities.description: Formats ABAP code using the pretty printer.

capabilities.name: gitRepos
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of Git repositories.

capabilities.name: gitExternalRepoInfo
capabilities.description: Retrieves information about an external Git repository.

capabilities.name: gitPullRepo
capabilities.description: Pulls changes from a Git repository.

capabilities.name: stageRepo
capabilities.description: Stages changes in a Git repository.

capabilities.name: pushRepo
capabilities.description: Pushes changes to a Git repository.

capabilities.name: remoteRepoInfo
capabilities.description: Retrieves information about a remote Git repository.

capabilities.name: switchRepoBranch
capabilities.description: Switches the branch of a Git repository.

capabilities.name: ddicElement
capabilities.description: Retrieves information about a DDIC element.

capabilities.name: bindingDetails
capabilities.description: Retrieves details of a service binding.

capabilities.name: tableContents
capabilities.description: Retrieves the contents of an ABAP table.

capabilities.name: runQuery
capabilities.description: Runs a SQL query on the target system.

capabilities.name: debuggerListeners
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of debugger listeners.

capabilities.name: debuggerChildVariables
capabilities.description: Retrieves child variables of a debugger variable.

capabilities.name: debuggerGoToStack
capabilities.description: Navigates to a specific stack entry in the debugger.

capabilities.name: debuggerSetVariableValue
capabilities.description: Sets the value of a debugger variable.

capabilities.name: atcCheckVariant
capabilities.description: Retrieves information about an ATC check variant.

capabilities.name: atcUsers
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of ATC users.

capabilities.name: isProposalMessage
capabilities.description: Checks if a given object is a proposal message.

capabilities.name: atcContactUri
capabilities.description: Retrieves the contact URI for an ATC finding.

capabilities.name: atcChangeContact
capabilities.description: Changes the contact for an ATC finding.

capabilities.name: tracesListRequests
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of trace requests.

capabilities.name: tracesHitList
capabilities.description: Retrieves the hit list for a trace.

capabilities.name: tracesDbAccess
capabilities.description: Retrieves database access information for a trace.
